title: The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election
text:
The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election 12:27am IST - 02:27 
Far-right activists are collaborating online to influence Italy's election, according to researchers at a counter extremism NGO who have gone undercover in private chats on encrypted apps. â–²Hide
